pr_title: fixes for inline subqueries when multi-value dimension is present

timeline.message: fixes for inline subqueries when multi-value dimension is present
allow missing capabilities for vectorized group by queries to be treated as single dims since it means that column doesnt exist

timeline.bodyText: nit: maybe nice to comment when columnCapabilities can be null?
timeline.author: jihoonson

replies.bodyText: added additional information to existing comment
replies.author: clintropolis
